bradleyross.library.helpers

Class ServletHelpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • bradleyross.library.helpers.ServletHelpers

  • public class ServletHelpers
extends Object
    General purpose helpers for use in creating servlets.
    Author:
    - Bradley Ross

    • Method Detail

      • formatElapsedTime

        public static String formatElapsedTime(long startTime)
        This method is intended to help in showing the elapsed time for generating a page.

        By using this method, you avoid the possibility of the value for milliseconds displaying with over a dozen digits due to round-off error.

        Parameters:
        startTime - Date (in milliseconds that was generated using a previous java.util.Date object.
        Returns:
        Formatted string containing the elapsed time in milliseconds
        See Also:
        Date, NumberFormat

      • valueWithDefault

        public static String valueWithDefault(String value,
                                      String ifDefault)
        Returns a default value if the examined value is null.

        Trying to run a number of String methods, such as equals or equalsIgnoreCase, result in exeptions being thrown if the object being examined has a value of null

        Parameters:
        value - String value to be examined
        ifDefault - Default value to be used if value is null
        Returns:
        String containing either examined or default value

      • getStringValueEscaped

        public static String getStringValueEscaped(ResultSet rs,
                                           String columnName)
                                    throws SQLException
        Return the contents of a character column in a result set as a String object.

        This method escapes the character strings using the HTML character entity literals before returning the data to the calling program.

        Parameters:
        rs - Result set to be read
        columnName - Name of column to be read
        Returns:
        Character data from database
        Throws:
        SQLException - if database errors
